structure.unit: PUBLIC PRINTING AND DISTRIBUTION OF PUBLIC DOCUMENTS

law.catch_line: Burning of courthouse -- Books replaced free of charge.
law.text: If any county courthouse containing the law library is destroyed by fire, the Legislative Research Commission shall, upon receipt of the affidavit of the county judge/executive showing the loss, furnish to the county acts of the General Assembly and journals of the House of Representatives and Senate, and the state law librarian shall furnish bound volumes of the opinions of the Court of Justice, if available.
law.history: Amended 1976 Ky. Acts ch. 62, sec. 54. -- Amended 1954 Ky. Acts ch. 42, sec. 20. -- Amended 1950 Ky. Acts ch. 156, sec. 4. -- Recodified 1942 Ky. Acts ch. 208, sec. 1, effective October 1, 1942, from Ky. Stat. sec. 2432a.
